WTOBJECT.name: Advance
WTOBJECT.WTCUSTOM: If reqTitle < 4 Then reqNextTitle = reqTitle + 1 Select Case reqNextTitle Case 2: reqNextTitle0 = 3 - CLng(.Personal) reqNextTitle1 = 12 - CLng(.Group) Case 3: reqNextTitle0 = 5 - CLng(.Personal) - 4 reqNextTitle2 = 10 - ( CLng(.Title2) + CLng(.Title3) + CLng(.Title4) ) Case 4: reqNextTitle0 = 8 - CLng(.Personal) reqNextTitle3 = 10 - ( CLng(.Title3) + CLng(.Title4) ) End Select End If

WTOBJECT.name: Advance
WTOBJECT.WTCUSTOM: If reqTitle < 4 Then reqNextTitle = reqTitle + 1 Select Case reqNextTitle Case 2: reqNextTitle0 = 2 - CLng(.Personal) reqNextTitle1 = 6 - CLng(.Group) Case 3: reqNextTitle0 = 4 - CLng(.Personal) - 4 reqNextTitle2 = 5 - ( CLng(.Title2) + CLng(.Title3) + CLng(.Title4) ) Case 4: reqNextTitle0 = 6 - CLng(.Personal) reqNextTitle3 = 5 - ( CLng(.Title3) + CLng(.Title4) ) End Select End If
